targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean(blocked) AS "blocked",mean(running) AS "Running",mean(sleeping) AS "Sleeping",mean(total) AS "Total",mean(total_threads) AS "Total Threads",mean(zombies) AS "Zombies" from processes WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
